subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Goalie Roberto Luongo was traded by the Vancouver Canucks to his former team, the Florida Panthers, who gave up goalie Jacob Markstrom and forward Shawn Mattias.
snippet: Goalie Roberto Luongo was traded by the Vancouver Canucks to his former team, the Florida Panthers, who gave up goalie Jacob Markstrom and forward Shawn Mattias.
